1370: Verthwi moved to Op Havick2.A.9 after marriage.
Got married to Sander at age 20 in 1370.
Gave birth to Zuanelt in 1370 at age 20.
1371: Gave birth to Hildegardis in 1371 at age 21.
1372: Gave birth to Margareta in 1372 at age 22.
1373: Gave birth to Imma in 1373 at age 23.
1375: Gave birth to Verthwi in 1375 at age 25.
1379: Lost son Arnst when Arnst was 0 years old.
Gave birth to stillborn Arnst in 1379 at age 29.
1383: Gave birth to Conzone in 1383 at age 33.
1384: Gave birth to Heillam in 1384 at age 34.
1389: Gave birth to Woutermanne in 1389 at age 39.
Lost son Heillam when Heillam was 6 years old.
